Package ca.cgjennings.spelling

Class SpellingCheckerChangeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent
        • ca.cgjennings.spelling.SpellingCheckerChangeEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class SpellingCheckerChangeEvent
extends ChangeEvent
    An event that is fired to registered listeners when changes are made to a SpellingChecker's settings.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int HIDDEN_WORD_ADDED
      A new word was added to the spelling checker's hidden word dictionary.
      static int IGNORE_WORD_ADDED
      A new word was added to the spelling checker (temporary) ignore dictionary.
      static int POLICY_CHANGE
      The WordPolicy on the spelling checker has changed.
      static int USER_WORD_ADDED
      A new word was added to the spelling checker (permanent) user's dictionary.

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Returns the type of change that this event is reporting.
        Returns:

      • getAddedWord

        public String getAddedWord()
        Returns the word that was added if this event is of an appropriate type.
        Returns:
        the newly added word
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this event is not due to adding a word
